wikipedia_page.main: Connor Lemonheigh-Evans (born 24 January 1997) is a Welsh footballer who plays for National League club Torquay United. He is a Wales under-21 international. He started his career at Bristol City and had loans at Bath City and Torquay United, before joining Torquay United for an undisclosed fee in August 2020.
